title: Does Trump Own Stock in a Company CDC Uses for COVID-19 Tests?
subtitle: The U.S. president’s finances are complex, but does Donald Trump actually benefit from the CDC’s testing procedures for the new coronavirus?
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Donald Trump owned stock in Thermo-Fisher Scientific at a time when his presidential administration was advocating for a COVID-19 test that uses Thermo-Fisher equipment.
